name: C. Travelling Salesman Problem
statement:
There are n cities numbered from 1 to n, and city i has beauty a_i.A
salesman wants to start at city 1, visit every city exactly once, and
return to city 1.For all i
ne j, a flight from city i to city j costs
max(c_i,a_j-a_i) dollars, where c_i is the price floor enforced by city
i. Note that there is no absolute value. Find the minimum total cost for
the salesman to complete his trip.
